allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add time series line chart to Contract Summary card

- Added LineChart component from recharts
- Created generateContractTrendData function to generate time series data
- Added custom LineTooltip for better data visualization
- Updated ภาพรวมสัญญา section to show both donut chart and line chart side by side
- Line chart displays trends for both Total Simplicity contracts and LOI Autocheck contracts
- Uses color theme: #0471d1 (blue) for Total Simplicity, #fbc41e (yellow) for LOI Autocheck
- Chart updates dynamically based on selected time range (7/30/90 days)

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
